channel.title: Isp
channel.description:
So, my ISP is terrible (I've complained to them multiple times) and their service has not gotten any better.
Averaging 27% packet loss, completely disconnected from the internet every 20 minutes (no exaggeration here), and speeds ranging from 5kbps-25mbps.
First packet loss test: http://www.dslreports.com/pingtest/9248ba62654b/2990511?r=7 Second packet loss test: http://www.dslreports.com/pingtest/4459bccb57bb/2990518?r=756 Multiple speed tests: http://gyazo.com/e44d376c8afaa7542b571118f4abecc2.png?1359844968
^ One of the speed tests is not in the image, the website did not register it as I was disconnected (had speeds of .1mbps download, 3mbps up).
Anyway, I cannot change my ISP as Comcast is the only "high speed" internet provider in my area. What would you guys recommend I do? I've shown them these tests and they have done nothing. Also, it isn't my router or modem as I've replaced each of them three times.
P.S. Notes over the past hour: 2:55pm: Disconnected 3:00pm: 12mbps down, 4mbps up 3:30pm: .56mbps down, 3.7mbps up 3:40pm: Disconnected

Sucks for you, Comcast over here is great.

I hear this 20 times a day on LoL when I complain

item.title: Isp
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

the elve age:

They haven’t offered to fix it or upgrade your service for free? I’ve had some problems with Comcast but they gave me an incredible Tv deal/internet package for messing up our services.

Nope Also my gaming friends in the neighborhood say that they have these same problems, so we all reported the issues to Comcast and asked for a technician to look at the lines… They haven’t changed anything at all yet though.

Read full topic

So, my ISP is terrible (I’ve complained to them multiple times) and their service has not gotten any better.

Averaging 27% packet loss, completely disconnected from the internet every 20 minutes (no exaggeration here), and speeds ranging from 5kbps-25mbps.

^ One of the speed tests is not in the image, the website did not register it as I was disconnected (had speeds of .1mbps download, 3mbps up).

Anyway, I cannot change my ISP as Comcast is the only “high speed” internet provider in my area. What would you guys recommend I do? I’ve shown them these tests and they have done nothing.
Also, it isn’t my router or modem as I’ve replaced each of them three times.

P.S. Notes over the past hour:
2:55pm: Disconnected
3:00pm: 12mbps down, 4mbps up
